panels.description: Daily usage over the last 31 days - The first and last records may be incomplete.

targets.query: SELECT non_negative_difference(max("bytes_rcvd"))  / 1024 / 1024 AS "received", non_negative_difference(max("bytes_sent"))  / 1024 / 1024 AS "sent" FROM "host:traffic" WHERE ("ifid"::tag =~ /^$iface_name$/) AND "host"::tag =~ /${selected_ipa:pipe}/ AND time >= now() - 31d GROUP BY time(5m), "host"::tag tz('$__timezone')

panels.title: Daily Usage (IP Address)

targets.query: SELECT non_negative_difference(max("bytes_rcvd"))  / 1024 / 1024 AS "received", non_negative_difference(max("bytes_sent"))  / 1024 / 1024 * -1 AS "sent" FROM "host:traffic" WHERE ("ifid"::tag =~ /^$iface_name$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "host"::tag

SELECT non_negative_difference(max("bytes_rcvd"))  / 1024 / 1024 as rcvd, non_negative_difference(max("bytes_sent"))  / 1024 / 1024 * -1 as sent FROM "host:traffic" WHERE ("ifid"::tag =~ /^$iface_name$/) AND $timeFilter AND "host"::tag =~ /${selected_ipa:pipe}/ GROUP BY "host"::tag, time($__interval)

panels.description: Total number of bytes sent and received <u>by each host</u>.

targets.query: SELECT non_negative_difference("bytes_rcvd")  / 1024 / 1024 AS "received", non_negative_difference("bytes_sent")  / 1024 / 1024 AS "sent" FROM "host:traffic" WHERE ("ifid"::tag =~ /^$iface_name$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "host"::tag

panels.title: Cumulative (IP Address)

targets.query: SELECT non_negative_difference(max("bytes_rcvd"))  / 1024 / 1024 as rcvd, non_negative_difference(max("bytes_sent"))  / 1024 / 1024 * -1 as sent FROM "mac:traffic" WHERE ("ifid"::tag =~ /^$iface_name$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "mac"::tag, time($__interval)

panels.description: Total number of bytes sent and received <u>by each MAC Address</u>.

targets.query: SELECT non_negative_difference("bytes_rcvd")  / 1024 / 1024 AS "received", non_negative_difference("bytes_sent")  / 1024 / 1024 AS "sent" FROM "mac:traffic" WHERE ("ifid"::tag =~ /^$iface_name$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "mac"::tag

targets.rawQueryText: SELECT oui, org FROM oui WHERE oui IN (${ouis:singlequote})

panels.title: Cumulative (MAC Address)

panels.description: Total number of bytes sent and received <u>by an organization</u>.

targets.queryText:
-- SELECT CAST(asn as TEXT) as asn, org from ASN4
SELECT CAST(asn as TEXT) as asn, org from ASN4 WHERE asn in (${asns:singlequote})
targets.rawQueryText:
-- SELECT CAST(asn as TEXT) as asn, org from ASN4
SELECT CAST(asn as TEXT) as asn, org from ASN4 WHERE asn in (${asns:singlequote})

panels.title: Cumulative

panels.description: Total number of ingress/egress bytes <u>for a country</u>.
panels.title: Cumulative

list.description: Minimum amount of data transfer for a value to be included in the "Cumulative" panels
list.label: Minimum data
list.name: min_data

list.description: Only show data for these IP addresses
list.label: IP Address
list.name: selected_ipa
